commit 263dc060aade9eb43a63bd6f9251f4c85667281d
Author: Dan Smith <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 11 10:11:52 2013 -0700

    Make Instance.save() log missing save handlers
    
    Also, fix the name of the _save_fault() handler to be what it should
    be, which is what triggered the ungraceful handling of this bug in
    the first place.
    
    Change-Id: I160f42b130810134135d2a22198fc0b66a7af585
    Closes-bug: 1223957
